SELECT DISTINCT G.id AS gachaId , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , F.file_url , G.price , G.view_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE gacha_id = G.id) AS wishCount , G.created_at , G.updated_at FROM GACHA G LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = G.file_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI ON GI.gacha_id = G.id WHERE 1=1
AND ( G.title LIKE #{keywordPattern} OR G.manufacturer LIKE #{keywordPattern} OR GI.name LIKE #{keywordPattern} )
ORDER BY G.created_at DESC
ORDER BY G.created_at ASC
ORDER BY G.price ASC
ORDER BY G.price DESC
ORDER BY wishCount DESC
ORDER BY G.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
